Uses of Class
org.descripter.js.api.core.CRegExp

  • Packages that use CRegExp 
    Package Description
    org.descripter.js.api
    Emulates the key features of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.api.core
    Represents the core objects of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.api.global
    Represents the global functions for core objects of the JavaScript language.

    • Uses of CRegExp in org.descripter.js.api

      Methods in org.descripter.js.api that return CRegExp 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CRegExp Script.re(java.lang.String re)
      Creates a CRegExp object.
      CRegExp Script.re(java.lang.String regexp, java.lang.String flags)
      Creates a CRegExp object with flags.

    • Uses of CRegExp in org.descripter.js.api.core

      Methods in org.descripter.js.api.core with parameters of type CRegExp 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CArray CString.match(CRegExp regexp)
      Searches the current string for one or more matches of regexp.
      java.lang.String CString.replace(CRegExp regexp, Function<?> lambda)
      Performs a search-and-replace operation on the current string.
      java.lang.String CString.replace(CRegExp regexp, java.lang.String newSubStr)
      Performs a search-and-replace operation on the current string.
      int CString.search(CRegExp regexp)
      Looks for a substring matching regexp within the current string and returns the position of the first character of the matching substring, or -1 if no match was found.
